title: We are Eva
description:
Are you reading this? Hi! My name is Eva. I’m the main protagonist of the game you’re looking at. Yes, this little platformer game is about me About me AND dimensional travel Do you want to know more?
Okay, well I am a (mostly) peaceful creature living between different worlds. Sleeping is usually all I do, but right now, something evil is happening to said worlds, and I want it to stop. That’s where I need you, for your ability to see in 2D There’s no time to explain Shark Pinball
